Subject: I crashed the game, again.
Message-ID: <92r28o+tcff@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 943
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: "dph of rules " <dph_of_rules@...>

Yep, it's true.  I crashed Gladiator again.
I had the following stats for my mega-archmage:
str 139
dex 141
con 139
int 151
arm 140
At what experience level, do the following stats cause the game to 
crash?  Why is that I can play against experience level 4000 slime 
without crashing the game, but everytime my character crosses over 
experience level 500, the game crashes?

By the way, I have discovered that a grid too big crashes the scenario 
 level editor and the game.  In other news, I created a scenario with 
enough gold to give a player 1.6 billion dollars.  It takes a while 
for that scenario to load, though.

In case you were wondering, I went from experience level 270 to 
experience level 572 in one scenario, fighting experience level 1000 
slime at skirmish.  Of course, I had some potions of magic, flight, 
invulnerability, invisibility, and speed to assist me.

Will someone from FSGames please respond to this message?
